channel.title: CVE Feed for Phpbits Creative Studio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Phpbits Creative Studio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-49772|2024-08-02T22:01:25.963Z -- phpbits%20creative%20studio -- genesis%20simple%20love
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Phpbits Creative Studio Genesis Simple Love.This issue affects Genesis Simple Love: from n/a through 2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31344|2024-06-04T17:36:38.312Z -- phpbits%20creative%20studio -- easy%20login%20styler%20%E2%80%93%20white%20label%20admin%20login%20page%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Phpbits Creative Studio Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-31344|2024-08-02T01:52:56.205Z -- phpbits%20creative%20studio -- easy%20login%20styler%20%E2%80%93%20white%20label%20admin%20login%20page%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Phpbits Creative Studio Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.6.
